channel.title: How can i make ::master work for everyone

item.title: How can i make ::master work for everyone
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Edit of ^^ Btw you may need to change the sendMessage to sM. You may also need to convert it.

} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 0) for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. you've successfuly cheated... noob."); }

item.title: How can i make ::master work for everyone
item.dc:creator: @tidus44 tidus44
item.description:
@tidus44 wrote:

Well i had somthing like this what i saw on other commands.

[quote] if (cmd[0].equals(“masterskill”) && (p.rights >= 0)){
for(int i = 0; i < 24; i++)
p.addSkillXP(999999999, i);
}

Oh sorry. Above them codes is this, and im pretty sure theresa no player rights there. Here:

if (cmd[0].equals("hp1")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if(p2 != null) { p2.chatText = ("I have been owned by the mighty...calumn"); p2.chatTextUpdateReq = true; p2.skillLvl[3] = 1; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("fall")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.chatText = ("I have been Owned"); p2.requestAnim(4367, 1); p2.chatTextUpdateReq = true; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

item.title: How can i make ::master work for everyone
item.dc:creator: @tidus44 tidus44
item.description:
@tidus44 wrote:

On my server i’ve been coding for the past few days… Only master works for Admin / Mod… and im trying to make it so evertone can use it. I’ve tried everything && (p.rights >=0)); All of this everything. But it just isnt working

Heres the code;

if (cmd[0].equals("masterskill") for(int i = 0; i < 24; i++) p.addSkillXP(999999999, i); } 
		if (cmd[0].equals("reset")) {

for(int i = 0; i < 24; i++)
p.addSkillXP(-999999999, i);
}

		if (cmd[0].equals("master")) {
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 0);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 1);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 2);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 3);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 4);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 5);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 6);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("pure")) {
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 0);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 2);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 3);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 4);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 5);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 6);
		}</blockquote>

Thanks for anyone who helps.

Read full topic
